comment.author: 10621515@N05
comment._content: Do we know the spot where it was taken?

comment.author: 31575009@N05
comment._content: Not exactly. We know this road is in Burwell in Cambridgeshire. I'll update the description to provide more information. Burwell has a "Ness Road" I notice but not obviously a 'Nest'.

comment.author: 34057753@N04
comment._content: Great - a pleasure to view. It is, as if the whole scenery could be restarted again with pushing one single button. I have almost a movie in my mind, what they did, after the shot was taken...

comment.author: 99822010@N05
comment._content: This toll was in between burwell and Fordham in Cambridgeshire known as Ness rd ! . There is another photo from another perspective on Newmarket history archive site which is in fact one of their mystery photos . Mystery solved ! :) the exact location is marked by an inscribed post on the spot .

comment.author: 99822010@N05
comment._content: I will try to upload photo of this to my favourites .
